actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that add-ons to the reimbursement limits for home health agencies may no longer be made for hospital-based agencies.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to utilize a uniform cost report for all home health agencies, whether free standing or hospital based. Permits the Secretary, on a case-by-case basis, to grant exceptions to the cost limits applicable to home health services furnished by either a hospital or a free standing home health agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that add-ons to the reimbursement limits for home health agencies may no longer be made for hospital-based agencies.
